activity.context_body: Rezime načina na koji ljudi komuniciraju sa {{site}}.
activity.no_targeted: Nemate podatke o ciljanom istraživanju koji bi se prikazali.

activity.tooltip_template: This is the single point tooltip template

form.add_field_instructions_info: Ova uputstva biće predstavljena kao opis korisniku prilikom popunjavanja ovog polja.
form.choose_order_message: Izaberite i odredite polja koja želite da uključite u ovo istraživanje
form.default_date_hint: If no date is added, the current time of posting would be added by default. The user can still update the {{ field_name }} after post submission.
form.field_add_other_desc: Allows entering a custom option that is not listed among the provided choices.

survey.marked_for_internal: This task is marked for internal use only. It is not seen by users when they create a post.
survey.internal_use_task: Zadatak je samo za internu upotrebu
survey.internal_use_task_desc: Ovaj zadatak će biti vidljiv samo korisniku koji ima dozvolu za upravljanje pobjavom
survey.show_this_task_to: Pokažite ovaj zadatak svima kada bude objavljen
survey.show_this_task_to_desc: Kada se objavi odgovor ankete, biće prikazani podaci iz ovog zadatka.
survey.title: Naslov
survey.disable_caption_field_explanation: Ovo će onemogućiti i sakriti sve postojeće naslove za ovo polje, ali možete ih ponovo omogućiti u bilo kojem trenutku.
survey.show_task: Pokažite ovaj zadatak svima kada bude objavljen post
survey.task_info: Svakoj objavi možete dodati dodatne informacije, poput prevoda ili verifikacije, i dodeliti ih ljudima dodavanjem zadataka. Možete birati između unapred izgrađenih zadataka ili kreirati svoje od početka.
survey.related_post_info: Please note, the posts to relate to needs to be published, posts that are "Under review" will not appear in the search-results
survey.datetime_desc: Datum sa vremenom u satima i minutama
survey.radio_desc: Omogućuje korisniku da odabere samo jednu od unaprijed definisanih skupova opcija
survey.checkbox_desc: Omogućuje korisniku da odabere jedan ili više od unaprijed definisanih skupova opcija.
survey.video_desc: Omogućuje umetanje video zapisa Youtube ili Vimeo u objavu
survey.markdown_desc: Omogućava upotrebu sintaksa za obeležavanje da stilišu sadržaj polja.
survey.task_visible_when_published: Ovaj zadatak će biti vidljiv kada bude objavljen post.
survey.require_section: Require this task be completed before a post can be visible to the public
survey.hide_author_information_desc: Only people with permission to edit responses will be able to see who submitted them; and only when editing them.
survey.hide_location_information_desc: Only people with permission to edit responses will be able to see exact locations. Other people will see rounded locations. The location will be accurate to {{precision}}km.
survey.hide_time_information_desc: Only people with permission to edit responses will be able to see exact time submitted. Other people will see only the date.
survey.required_desc: Require this task be completed before a post can be visible to the public.
survey.require_review: Require posts to be reviewed before they're published
survey.require_review_desc: New responses to this survey will be put 'under review', and therefore not immediately visible to the public. Users with permission to review the response can review and 'publish' them, which would then make them visible to everyone.
survey.response_private_desc: Only people with permission to edit responses can see responses to this field
survey.require_task_desc: Require this task be completed before a post can be visible to the public
survey.only_edit: Only people with permission to edit responses will be able to see responses to this field.
survey.who_can_add: Who can add to this survey
survey.choose_survey_field: Choose what should be assigned to each survey field
survey.choose_survey_field_desc: Each of the survey's fields are listed below. Choose the data from {{datasource_type}} that you'd like to use to populate each of those fields.
survey.who_can_contribute_to_task: Who can contribute to fields in this task

delete.desc: If you delete this survey, all of its posts will also be deleted. Proceed with caution.
delete.desc_field: If you delete this field, all of the data that was collected within it will also be deleted. Proceed with caution.

survey.name: Naziv ankete

delete.desc: If you delete this task, all of the data captured in it will also be deleted. Proceed with caution.

validation.required: Required fields are missing, these fields are marked with an *.

targeted_survey.title: Create a new targeted survey
targeted_survey.description: Send questions via SMS to a list of those phone numbers.
targeted_survey.name: Naziv ankete
targeted_survey.add_questions_description: We will send each question as a separate SMS. After someone responds, we will send the next question in the survey.
targeted_survey.question_description: This is what users will see when they go to your survey.
targeted_survey.sample_question: Sample question: Hi there! How are you feeling today? Your response is free.
targeted_survey.send_to_old_number_warning: If you are messaging a number that you have messaged in the past, that person's responses will always apply to the most recent survey. They will no longer be able to reply to previous unanswered survey questions.
targeted_survey.publish_description_many: We will send {{questions}} questions to {{numbers}} people via SMS for a total of {{total_sms_messages}} messages. Your telecommunications provider will charge you for each message. Please be careful about the costs you will incur by sending this survey. This action cannot be undone.
targeted_survey.publish_description_one_question: We will send {{questions}} question to {{numbers}} people via SMS for a total of {{total_sms_messages}} messages. Your telecommunications provider will charge you for each message. Please be careful about the costs you will incur by sending this survey. This action cannot be undone.
targeted_survey.publish_description_one_number: We will send {{questions}} questions to {{numbers}} person via SMS for a total of {{total_sms_messages}} messages. Your telecommunications provider will charge you for each message. Please be careful about the costs you will incur by sending this survey. This action cannot be undone.
targeted_survey.publish_description_one_number_one_quest: We will send {{questions}} question to {{numbers}} person via SMS for a total of {{total_sms_messages}} message. Your telecommunications provider will charge you for each message. Please be careful about the costs you will incur by sending this survey. This action cannot be undone.
targeted_survey.question_warning: You must enter at least 1 question.
targeted_survey.publish_warning: Are you sure you ant to send this SMS survey?
targeted_survey.publish_notification_many: {{messages}} messages will be sent as part of this survey. You will be charged for these messages by your telecommunications provider
targeted_survey.publish_notification_one: {{messages}} message will be sent as part of this survey. You will be charged for that message by your telecommunications provider
targeted_survey.hide_responders_desc: The phone numbers of the people who respond to your questions remain hidden from the public site. Only the team members with edit permissions will be able to see them.
targeted_survey.name_warning: You must give your survey a name.
targeted_survey.description_warning: You must give your survey a description.
targeted_survey.send_to_person: Targeted: Send this survey to {{recipientCount}} person via SMS
targeted_survey.send_to_people: Targeted: Send this survey to {{recipientCount}} people via SMS
targeted_survey.phone_number_warning: You must enter at least 1 phone number.
targeted_survey.one_repeat_alert: We removed a total of {{repeatCount}} repeat number from your list.
targeted_survey.multi_repeat_alert: We removed a total of {{repeatCount}} repeat numbers from your list.
targeted_survey.multi_number_error: Of the {{total}} phone numbers you entered, we noticed problems with {{bad}} of them. Please correct the phone numbers below and continue. Numbers must match the selected country's formatting rules.
targeted_survey.one_number_error: Of the {{total}} phone numbers you entered, we noticed problems with {{bad}} of them. Please correct the phone number below and continue. Numbers must match the selected country's formatting rules.
targeted_survey.question_error: You must add at least one question.
targeted_survey.phone_number_instructions: Please type in the phone numbers you'd like to contact. You must place a comma between each phone number.
targeted_survey.targeted_survey_desc: We sent this survey via SMS
targeted_survey.error_message: An error occurred while trying to save your targeted survey
targeted_survey.error_contacts: Some of the numbers you provided failed, please check your numbers and try again

donation.web_monetization_text: Ushahidi deployments are now web monetization enabled. Web monetization is a way of supporting the websites you love without playing advertisers game. All you need is to get your browser setup. Click the link below to learn how you can donate.

category.delete_category_desc: Ako izbrišete ovu kategoriju ona više neće biti povezana sa bilo kojim objavama. Nastavite sa oprezom.
category.child_permissions: Dozvolama za ovu kategoriju upravlja matična kategorija.

editor.name: Naziv kategorije
editor.slug_help: Ako ostane prazno, automatski će se generirati iz naziva kategorije.
editor.roles_help: Samo odabrane uloge će moći da pregledaju ovu kategoriju.

settings.api_key_desc: API ključ je jedinstven za vašu implementaciju, može se koristiti da sistemima trećih strana omogući interakciju sa vašom Ushahidi implementacijom.
settings.create_open_or_targeted: Napravite otvorenu ili ciljanu anketu da biste prikupili informacije o Ushahidi.
settings.embed_info: Da biste mapu ugradili na drugu veb lokaciju, koristite isječak koda u nastavku.

settings_list.general_desc: Promenite naziv, opis, logotip i druge detalje vašeg rasporeda.
settings_list.surveys_desc: Kreirajte i konfigurišite ankete koje vaša implementacija sakuplja.
settings_list.data_sources_desc: Konfigurišite e-poštu, SMS i kanale društvenih medija koji će pomoći u vašoj implementaciji sakupljanja podatke iz ankete.
settings_list.import_desc: Otpremite podatke ankete u vašu implementaciju iz CSV datoteke.
settings_list.user_settings_desc: Konfigurišite svoj API tako da se vaši Ushahidi označeni podaci mogu preneti na vaš nalog za Humanitarnu razmenu podataka (HDX).
settings_list.export_desc_hxl: Izvezite svoje podatke u obliku CSV datoteke ili dodelite oznake i osobine vašim podacima i prenesite ih direktno na vaš nalog za Humanitarnu razmenu podataka (HDx) ili ih izvezite kao označenu CSV datoteku
settings_list.export_desc: Izvezite sve svoje podatke u obliku CSV datoteke ili odaberite prilagođena polja za izvoz
settings_list.users_desc: Kreirajte i upravljajte ljudima koji doprinose vašoj implementaciji.
settings_list.roles_desc: Kreirajte i upravljajte tipom dozvola koje vaši korisnici imaju na vašoj implementaciji.
settings_list.categories_desc: Kreirajte i upravljajte kategorijama u koje ljudi mogu postavljati objave radi poboljšanja organizacije.
settings_list.webhooks_desc: Kreirajte web prikaze koji šalju podatke Ushahidi platforme spoljnim aplikacijama kada se pokreću određeni događaji.
settings_list.donation_desc: Create and manage the donations people can make towards your organisation.

user_settings.user_settings_desc_1: Ovde možete dodati svoj jedinstveni API ključ za svoj nalog za Humanitarnu razmenu podataka (HDX).
user_settings.user_settings_desc_2: Nakon postavljanja, ovo će vam omogućiti da direktno učitavate podatke na Humanitarnom nalogu za razmenu podataka (HDX).
user_settings.user_settings_desc_3: API ključ možete pronaći na svom profilu za Humanitarnu razmjenu podataka (HDX) nakon što ste prijavljeni.
user_settings.view_guide: Pogledajte vodič za vaš API ključ
user_settings.profile_page: Nalazi se na vašoj stranici profila za Humanitarnu razmenu podataka (HDX)
user_settings.api_key_saved: API ključ je sačuvan! Sada možete označiti svoje podatke i učitati na nalog za Humanitarnu razmenu podataka (HDX).
user_settings.hdx_maintainer_id_min_length: HDX Maintainer Id is too short

webhooks.enable_source_destination_desc: Ova web-kukica biće primenjena samo na ankete izabranog tipa.

validation.please_provide_valid_api_url: Please provide valid API URL with http(s)://
validation.secret_key_cannot_be_less_start: Shared secret key can not less than

data_sources.do_you_really_want_to_disconnect: Do you really want to disconnect your provider?
data_sources.associate_with_form_desc: Svi dolazni podaci od {{provajdera}} će se koristiti za kreiranje odgovora na anketu koju odaberete
data_sources.hint_turn_on_off: Možete konfigurisati opcije za izvore podataka, a zatim da ih uključite i isključite.
data_sources.hint_plugin_needs_configuring: Morate konfigurisati ovaj izvor podataka pre nego što ga možete omogućiti.
data_sources.unavailable: Izvor podataka {{value}} nije dostupan. Nadogradite svoj plan da biste ga iskoristili!

email.incoming_server_port_desc: Uobičajeni prtovi: 110 (POP3), 143 (IMAP), 995 (POP3 sa SSL), 993 (IMAP sa SSL)
email.email_sender_name_desc: Appears in the 'from:' field on outgoing emails

frontline_sms.secret_desc: Podesite tajnu tako da samo ovlašćeni FrontlineCloud nalozi mogu slati / primati poruku. Morate da konfigurišete istu tajnu u FrontlineCloud aktivnostima.

smssync.intro_step_1: 1. korak: preuzmite aplikaciju "SMSSync" sa Android Market-a.
smssync.intro_step_1_desc: Skenirajte ovaj QR kod telefonom da biste preuzeli aplikaciju sa Android Market-a
smssync.intro_step_2_desc: Uključite SMSSync i koristite sledeću vezu kao URL za sinhronizaciju:
smssync.secret_desc: Podesite tajnu tako da samo ovlašćeni SMSSync uređaji mogu slati / primati poruku. Morate da konfigurišete istu tajnu u aplikaciji SMSSync.

twilio.phone_nb_desc: Broj telefona. Omogućen je Twilio telefonski broj za vrstu poruke koju želite poslati.
twilio.account_sid_desc: Jedinstveni ID naloga koji je poslao ovu poruku.

twitter.intro_step_1:
1. korak: Kreirajte novu aplikaciju za Twitter:
Twitter aplikacijama može biti potrebno nekoliko sati ili dana da ih Twitter odobri.
Imajte ovo na umu ako su vam ovi podaci brzo trebni.
twitter.intro_step_2: Korak 2: Generišite potrošački ključ i tajnu
twitter.intro_step_2_desc:
Nakon što kreirate aplikaciju, kliknite na "Ključevi i pristup tokeni".
Zatim kliknite "Generiši potrošački ključ i tajnu".
Kopirajte ključeve, tokene i tajne u polja ispod.
twitter.consumer_key_desc: odajte potrošački ključ iz svoje Twitter aplikacije.
twitter.consumer_secret_desc: Dodajte potrošačku tajnu iz svoje Twitter aplikacije.
twitter.access_token_desc: Dodajte pristupni token koji ste generisali za svoju aplikaciju Twitter.
twitter.access_token_secret_desc: Dodajte tajnu pristupa koju ste generisali za svoju aplikaciju Twitter.
twitter.search_terms_desc: Dodajte pojmove za pretraživanje odvojene zarezima

roles.roles_description: These options control what this type of role can make changes to. <a href="https://www.ushahidi.com/support/custom-roles#add-a-role" target="_blank">Visit our support guides to find out more.

settings.deployment_delete_info: Ako izbrišete ovu implementaciju, svi njeni podaci će takođe biti izbrisani. Nastavite sa oprezom.
settings.map_precise_to: Kada je skrivanje lokacije za anketu omogućeno , lokacije će biti tačne za:
settings.site_email_note: Budite oprezni jer će to biti vidljivo svima na vašoj veb lokaciji.
settings.site_private_desc: Omogućavanje ove opcije čini vašu implementaciju sa  dostupnim samo registriranim korisnicima sa ispravnim ovlašćenjima, koji se moraju prijaviti za pristup
settings.site_disable_registration_desc: Checking this disables the registration feature. Admins will have to manually add users.

features.please_select_features: Please select the features you would like to enable.

settings.add_first_post_subtitle: A deployment is nothing until it has some content in it.
settings.invite_people: Or invite people to help you create posts.

data_import.choose_which_column: Izaberite koju CSV kolonu treba dodeliti svakom polju ankete
data_import.each_survey_field: Svako od polja ankete je dole navedeno. Izaberite kolonu iz svoje CSV datoteke koju želite da upotriebite za popunjavanje svakog od ovih polja.
data_import.status_explanation: Ushahidi prepoznaje jednu od tri statusa posta: Objavljeno, U pregledu i Arhivirano. Zato budite sigurni da svaki unos u koloni koju odaberete ima jednu od ove tri vrednosti.
data_import.defined_column: Definisano kolonom u vašoj CSV datoteci ...
data_import.imported_posts_status: Uvezene objave trebale bi imati svoj status ...
data_import.import_error: An error has occurred importing your CSV file.
data_import.complete_info: Podaci iz vaše CSV tabele, {{filename}}, uspešno su uveženi.
data_import.finish_info: Podaci iz vaše CSV tabele i dalje se obrađuju. Možete napustiti ovu stranicu ili sačekati dok se postupak ne dovrši. U svakom slučaju, obavestićemo vas kada su vaši podaci spremni.
data_import.configure_explanation: Kroz ovo interfejs možete postaviti vrednosti za polja ankete koja nisu preslikana na unose u CSV-u. Ove vrednosti će biti iste za sve uvezene objave.
data_import.import_explanation_csv: Uvezite podatke iz CSV tabele u vašu implementaciju kao objave koji pripadaju određenoj anketi
data_import.import_explanation_file_size: Veličina jedne datoteke ograničena je na 10 MB
data_import.import_explanation_format_location_1: Geografske lokacije treba da budu uključene u vašem CSV-u  kao zasebe kolone geografske širine i dužine.
data_import.import_explanation_required_fields: Sva obavezna polja ankete moraju imati pridruženu vrednost postavljenu u CSV-u. Na primjer, ako je neophodan polje naslova, polje se mora preslikati u CSV koloni gde svi redovi date kolone imaju postavljenu vrijednost
data_import.has_tasks_required_end: , includes tasks that typically must be completed for each post before they can be marked 'published.' During this import, all of your imported posts will have their tasks marked as 'incomplete', while still allowing their status to be marked as 'published.' If you edit any of these posts after they've been imported, however, you'll be asked to complete those tasks before re-publishing them.
data_import.organize_your_imported_data: Dodelite CSV kolonama da objavljuju polja
data_import.assign_csv_message: Dodelite CSV kolonama da objavljuju polja
data_import.csv_instructions: Svako od imena kolone iz CSV datoteke su navedene dole. Izaberite polje {{form_name}} u koje želite da se svaka kolona uvozi.
data_import.csv_instructions_required_fields: Polja označena sa [*] su obavezna i njima se mora dodeliti vrednost.

data_export.title: Izvoz podataka
data_export.description: Izvezite sve svoje podatke u obliku CSV-a ili odaberite određena polja ankete koja želite eksportovati
data_export.description_hxl: Izvezite sve svoje podatke u obliku CSV-a ili odaberite određena polja ankete koja želite eksportovati.
data_export.and_choose: i odlučite da je otpremite u
data_export.account: nalog ili preuzanje u obliku CSV datoteke s 'oznakom' HXL.
data_export.select_fields_desc: Ako ne želite da izvezete sve svoje podatke odjednom, za izvoz možete odabrati određena polja iz svake ankete.
data_export.export_progress:
Izvoz je u toku...

Možete da napustite ovu stranicu ako želite. Izvoz će se nastaviti.

Obavestićemo vas kada završimo.
data_export.no_fields: Uh uh... prvo morate odabrati neka polja za izvoz.
data_export.hxl_apikey_alert_1: Izgleda da niste postavili API za humanitarnu razmenu podataka (HDX). Bez ovog podešavanja ne možete označiti podatke i prenijeti na nalog za humanitarnu razmenu podataka (HDX).
data_export.hxl_apikey_alert_2: Toplo vam savetujemo da unutra ovo postavite sada
data_export.hxl_apikey_alert_3: pre nego što nastavite, jer nećete moći da pošaljete svoje podatke na HDX
data_export.hxl_title: Dodijelite svoje HXL oznake i atribute, odaberite polja i izvozite ili prenesite
data_export.hxl_desc: Izaberite određena polja iz ankete, dodelite oznaku po polju, a zatim izaberite da dodelite više atributa. Pregledajte svoju oznaku i atribute u pregledu oznaka.
data_export.hxl_instructions_1: Zatim možete da izvozite svoja obeležena polja u CSV datoteku ili da ih pošaljete u
data_export.hxl_instructions_8: for more information on how to choose the best HXL tags and attributes for your data or the
data_export.upload_title: Are you ready to upload to an Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) account?
data_export.hdx_csv_title: Are you ready to export to CSV?
data_export.upload_desc:
You selected {{fields}} fields to upload to a Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) account.

You assigned tags and attributes - to check, you can go back. If you are done, you can add details and upload.

The Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) requires a few more details in order to upload to their system. You'll add these next
data_export.hdx_csv_desc:
You selected {{fields}} fields to export to CSV.

You assigned tags and attributes - to check these are correct, you can go back and check. If you're done, you can export.
data_export.upload_button: Add dataset details and upload to hdx
data_export.details_desc: To upload to the Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) some extra details are required.
data_export.privacy_desc: You have a choice of sharing your dataset publicly or restricting access to other members of the organisation which owns the dataset.
data_export.private_desc: Private (Only you and other HDX members of your organisation can search, view/edit or download this dataset)
data_export.public_desc: Public (Anyone can search, view/edit or download this dataset)
data_export.dataset_desc: When users search for data on HDX, their search terms will be matched to terms in your title. Avoid using abbreviations in the title which may not be familiar to all users. Also, avoid using words such as current, latest or previous when referring to the time period (e.g Latest 3W) as these terms become misleading as the dataset ages.
data_export.dataset_example: Example dataset title: Who is Doing What Where in Afghanistan, Jan-Dec 2015
data_export.metadata_desc: Metadata is additional information about your dataset that will make it easier for others to understand and put your data into context. Datasets on HDX must include a set of metadata fields.
data_export.uploading_data_desc:
The data upload to your Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) account is in progress...

You can navigate away from this page while this upload happens but please don't close the browser.
data_export.uploading_data_err: Uh oh... Something went wrong when uploading your data, please check the required fields and your api-key and try again.
data_export.no_fields_selected: You haven't selected any fields or assigned any hxl tags or attributes. Please select at least one field and assign at least one tag to be able to export to CSV or upload to a Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) account.

validation.title: A title is needed
validation.all_fields: Please fill in all required fields
